title: Life Expectancy and Population
text:
Life Expectancy and Population
This page analyzes the relationship between Life Expectancy and Population using the Gapminder dataset.

# Load necessary libraries
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns


# Load the Gapminder dataset
data_path = "/Users/calebsharkey/Documents/School/qtm350/qtm350-quiz02/gapminder.csv"
gapminder = pd.read_csv(data_path)

# Plot Life Expectancy vs. Population
plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
sns.scatterplot(data=gapminder, x="population_millions", y="life_expectancy")
plt.xscale("log") 
plt.xlabel("Population (using log scale)")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy (years)")
plt.title("Life Expectancy vs. Population")
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()

title: Quiz2
text:
The Gapminder dataset contains contains information about life expectancy, population, and GDP per capita in 142 countries over the years 1952 to 2007, with a 5-year interval.
This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

title: Country Analysis
text:
Country Analysis: Argentina
This page analyzes changes in life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population for the country of Argentina over time.

# Load necessary libraries
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns


# Load the Gapminder dataset
data_path = "/Users/calebsharkey/Documents/School/qtm350/qtm350-quiz02/gapminder.csv"
gapminder = pd.read_csv(data_path)

# Plot Life Expectancy vs. Time
plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
sns.scatterplot(data=gapminder, x="year", y="life_expectancy")
plt.xlabel("Time (years)")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy (years)")
plt.title("Life Expectancy vs. Time")
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()









import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

data_path = "/Users/calebsharkey/Documents/School/qtm350/qtm350-quiz02/gapminder.csv"
gapminder = pd.read_csv(data_path)

# GDP per capita vs. Time
plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
sns.scatterplot(data=gapminder, x="year", y="gdp_per_capita")
plt.yscale("log")
plt.xlabel("Time (years)")
plt.ylabel("GDP per capita ")
plt.title("GDP per capita vs. Time")
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()









import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

data_path = "/Users/calebsharkey/Documents/School/qtm350/qtm350-quiz02/gapminder.csv"
gapminder = pd.read_csv(data_path)

# Population vs. Time
plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
sns.scatterplot(data=gapminder, x="year", y="population_millions")
plt.yscale("log")
plt.xlabel("Time (years)")
plt.ylabel("Population (millions)")
plt.title("Population vs. Time")
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()

title: Life Expectancy and GDP per capita
text:
Life Expectancy and GDP per Capita
This page analyzes the relationship between Life Expectancy and GDP per capita using the Gapminder dataset.

# Load necessary libraries
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

# Load the Gapminder dataset
data_path = "/Users/calebsharkey/Documents/School/qtm350/qtm350-quiz02/gapminder.csv"
gapminder = pd.read_csv(data_path)

# Plot Life Expectancy vs. GDP per Capita
plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))
sns.scatterplot(data=gapminder, x="gdp_per_capita", y="life_expectancy")
plt.xscale("log")
plt.xlabel("GDP per Capita (log scale)")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy (years)")
plt.title("Life Expectancy vs. GDP per Capita")
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
